DOC.brief_summary: The differential diagnosis gastric submucosal tumor endoscopic ultrasound currently suboptimal . Needle-based confocal laser endomicroscopy ( nCLE ) novel endoscopic technique , compatible 19-gauge FNA needle . Under endoscopic ultrasonography ( EUS ) guidance , nCLE enable real-time vivo image lesion tissue cellular subcellular level . This study aim describe nCLE interpretation criterion characterization gastric submucosal tumor , histopathological correlation , perform validation criterion .
DOC.brief_title: Endoscopic Ultrasound-guided Needle-based Confocal Laser Endomicroscopy Diagnosis Gastric Submucosal Tumors
